meanings.definition: Of or relating to the weasel family.
meanings.sent1: The small, agile musteline creatures are known for their sleek bodies and sharp teeth.
meanings.sent2: The musteline features of the animal made it easy to identify as part of the weasel family.
meanings.sent3: The musteline family reunion was filled with playful antics and quick movements.
meanings.sent4: Her musteline instincts kicked in as she swiftly dodged the incoming ball.
meanings.sent5: The musteline characteristics of the creature were unmistakable in the wild.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a weasel.
meanings.sent1: The long, slender shape of the musteline toy reminded her of a weasel.
meanings.sent2: His sly grin had a musteline quality that made her suspicious of his intentions.
meanings.sent3: The musteline pattern on the fabric gave the dress a playful and mischievous look.
meanings.sent4: Her musteline gaze seemed to see right through his excuses.
meanings.sent5: The musteline movements of the dancer captivated the audience with their grace.

meanings.definition: A member of the weasel family.
meanings.sent1: The musteline darted across the path, disappearing into the bushes in a flash.
meanings.sent2: She spotted a musteline peeking out from behind a rock, its curious eyes fixed on her.
meanings.sent3: The musteline's playful antics entertained the visitors at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The musteline's sleek fur glistened in the sunlight as it scurried along the fence.
meanings.sent5: The musteline's sharp teeth were on full display as it devoured its meal with gusto.
